content: *give the bride-to-be this pretty blue garter to wear on her wedding day * ~ from the pattern **note** you must register on the freepatterns website to be able to access the free patterns also available at free-crochet 1 1 http //www free-crochet com/search html criteria=fc00546 uses size 10 cotton thread with a #7 steel hook also requires satin ribbon satin roses and elastic
